definition: to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale

sentences.english: Conversely, Protestants often interpret the Old Testament scriptures more literally than Catholics.
sentences.chinese: 相反，新教教徒往往用更爲書面的語言解釋聖經舊約。

sentences.english: Model your thoughts after the Psalmists of old.
sentences.chinese: 在舊約聖歌唱完之後讓你的思想成形。

sentences.english: In the Old Testament, the son of Abraham who was cast out after the birth of Isaac.
sentences.chinese: 以實瑪利舊約中亞伯拉罕之子，在以撒出生後被棄。

sentences.english: Open up to Leviticus 16 to see an Old Testament picture of forgiveness.
sentences.chinese: 打開利未記16章，看一張舊約恕罪的圖片。

sentences.english: We don't have a Canon even of the Old Testament, much less of the New Testament yet.
sentences.chinese: 甚至連舊約都還沒有集成正典，那就更別提新約了。

sentences.english: Important books of the Old Testament were written or assembled at roughly the same time.
sentences.chinese: 聖經舊約的重要篇章也大概在這個時期撰寫或者編纂。

sentences.english: The Old Testament is as explicit about the Trinity and the deity of the Messiah as is the New Testament.
sentences.chinese: 舊約是關於三位一體和明確的彌賽亞神象新約。

sentences.english: What are we to conclude from the Old Testament's treatment of the subject of divorce and remarriage?
sentences.chinese: 我們從舊約對待離婚和再婚的問題上得出什麼結論？

sentences.english: We know how Jesus himself completed and even changed the Old Testament.
sentences.chinese: 我們知道基督怎樣滿全了舊約，甚至修改了舊約。

sentences.english: We know how Jesus himself completed and even changed the Old Testament.
sentences.chinese: 我們知道基督怎樣滿全了舊約，甚至修改了舊約。

sentences.english: In the Old Testament, which tribe was considered the "royal priesthood"?
sentences.chinese: 在舊約中，哪個部落被認爲是“有君尊的祭司”？

sentences.english: The Book of Malachi is the last in the canon of the Old Testament Prophets.
sentences.chinese: 該瑪拉基書是最後一次在佳能的舊約先知。

sentences.english: He says that Jesus is the Messiah that the Old Testament long prophesied.
sentences.chinese: 他說耶穌就是舊約預言已久的彌賽亞。

sentences.english: The Scrolls have revolutionized textual criticism of the Old Testament.
sentences.chinese: 古卷在舊約全書的基礎上徹底做了校對。

sentences.english: It is one of the five books of the Old Testament that make up the Pentateuch .
sentences.chinese: 此卷是《舊約》的五書之一，它們構成“摩西五經”。

sentences.english: All of these things Paul says were according to the Old Testament Scriptures.
sentences.chinese: 保羅所講的一切都是照著舊約聖經所說的發生。

definition: trustworthy/reliable/to believe something to be true
to visit a place for the memories/to pay homage to (the deceased)
to merge together (idiom); to unify disparate elements into one whole
